attributes.action: Step up, and help to execute a solution to help remove Taliban from Afghanistan
attributes.additional_details: The Taliban are stopping the civilians of Afghanistan from living peacefully. Forceful marriage, denial of education, rape, mutilation and torture are only one of the few hostilities the Taliban have brought to Afghanistan. Thousands of civilians are started to move to different location in order to survive and escape from the Taliban. Once the Taliban take control of the Afghan Government, there will only be dictatorship - no freedom; no peace. Thousands of lives being taken away...
attributes.background: Bring light to the current situation in Afghanistan. After the withdrawal of the US troops in Afghanistan, the Taliban have started to take over many regions by killing, raping and torturing civilians. The UK have the power to support Afghanistan by mentioning this situation to the United Nations.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594723
